message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll be interested in. Would you like to make an offer for it?
Thank you for offering the product. I'm interested, but I can only pay $80 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a profit. I can offer you a discount, but I need to get at least $90 for the product. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, could we aim for $85?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I still need to make a profit. I can offer you a slight discount, but I need to get at least $88 for the product. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?
